name: UFGBuildDescriptor
comment: Descriptor for things that can be built in the BuildGun.

methods.name: GetBuildCategory
methods.comment: Get the category for this building descriptor.

methods.name: GetSubCategories
methods.comment: Get the category for this building descriptor.

methods.name: GetBuildMenuPriority
methods.comment: The order we want stuff in the build menu, lower is earlier

methods.name: GetHologramClass
methods.comment: The order we want stuff in the build menu, lower is earlier

methods.name: GetBuildClass
methods.comment: Get the build actor class for this building descriptor.

properties.name: mBuildCategory
properties.comment: The category in the build menu for this building

properties.name: mSubCategories
properties.comment: The sub categories in the build menu for this building

properties.name: mBuildMenuPriority
properties.comment: The order in the Build Menu is decided by this value. Lower values means earlier in menu. Negative values are allowed. [-N..0..N]
